title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Mix eggs with Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Drain pasta, mix with bacon, and add egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Fry onions until golden, then add tomato puree.
Add cream and grilled chicken pieces, simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.
